channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiClientMac
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiClientMac

item.title: CVE-2024-31492|2024-04-10T13:24:56.859Z -- Fortinet -- FortiClientMac
item.description: An external control of file name or path vulnerability [CWE-73] in FortiClientMac version 7.2.3 and below, version 7.0.10 and below installer may allow a local attacker to execute arbitrary code or commands via writing a malicious configuration file in /tmp before starting the installation process.
